title: Texas principal fights for his job as race roils school district
description: James Whitfield is one of the most prominent casualties in a national war over race, history and diversity. The principal at Colleyville Heritage High School, Whitfield was put under administrative leave after he was attacked by protestors who accused him of teaching critical race theory at his high school.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
